testcase.name: should go to the login page if not logged in
should go straight to the inscription form if logged in
the 'Im inscribing myself' option is checked by default
should fill the form with my user data when inscribing myself
the basic fields are ALWAYS shown in the form
my user data fields should be locked when inscribing myself
my user data fields should unlock when inscribing another person
the form should not let me finish a step with errors
the form should let me finish a step with no errors
not filling a mandatory field is considered an error
should show field error messages when validation fails
